Package samples.ui

Contains classes that support the SNAP Mobile reference graphical user interface.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
EventListener Callback interface for event notification.
 

Class Summary
Button This class implements a user interface button class.
ChatBox This class implements user interface chat message display class.
Choice This class implements a user interface toggle class that can be in either an on or off state..
Component This class implements an abstract user interface class that provides basic functions to control layout (position, width, height), display (foreground/background color, font, shadows, border, painting), and control (event dispatching and focus control).
CustomFont  
Event This class implements a simple event message used to represent user interface actions.
Label This class implements a user interface label class.
List This class implements a popup menu.
PageBreak This class implements an invisible PageBreak component.
PagedView This class implements the concept of a paged view.
ResourceManager This class implements a cache for managing shared user interface resources.
ScrollableComponent This class is a subclass of the base Component class.
ScrollView This class implements a vertically scrollable view for scrollable components.
Table This class implements a graphical table.
TableRow This class implements a row in a graphical table.
TextBox This class implements a text box that can hold and displays multiple rows of text.
TextField This class implements an editable text field which can hold and display a single line of text.
Util  
View This class implements the concept of a view.
ViewCanvas This class implements a full-screen canvas with multiple views.
 

Package samples.ui Description

Contains classes that support the SNAP Mobile reference graphical user interface.
